name: COCO's NoteBook
description:
Coco's friends gathered together and drew a game inside his notebook.  Nostalgia:

A small game made by a group of three friends. We hope to catch our childhood nostalgia of playing Fancypants Adventure and other scribbly flash games. This game features hand-drawn sprites, silly sounds, and precision gameplay to keep you focused. We hope people enjoy playing this game, as much as we laughed while making it.

Goal:

Destroy UFOs! and save the NoteBook!

Controls:
  •  Tap: Jump
 
  • Double Tap: Fireball
  • Hold&Release: Stops running, Shooting Vertical
Design Constraints:
  • One button only 
  • One Week
  • No axis Mapping
Game Design Document:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/11RP_E72n3W8QYnFAp0sqNA4t47qMzvglOt6ARrLO6FE/...

Contributors:

Diego Leonardo Gonzalez Lopez: Programming, Tech Designer, UI Design, Technical Animator

Vittal Gunja: Art, Game Design, Voice Acting, Sprite Design, Enemy Layout Design

Oguz Bicer: Project Management, Player Design, Level Sprite Design, Level Layout Design
